info.name: Chilli Idly Fry
info.description: A South Indian dish made with idlis (steamed rice cakes) coated in a spicy chilli sauce.

info.name: Podi Idly Fry
info.description: A South Indian dish made with idlis (steamed rice cakes) coated in spicy podi (powder) made with lentils and spices and then pan-fried.

info.name: Pepper Idly Fry
info.description: Idli mixed with black pepper for a spicy kick.

info.name: Sambar Vada (2 Pieces)
info.description: Vada soaked in sambar, a lentil-based vegetable soup.

info.name: Vada [1 piece]
info.description: A deep-fried savory doughnut made with lentil batter.

info.name: Upma
info.description: A South Indian dish made with semolina, vegetables, and Indian spices.

info.name: Paneer Sevai
info.description: A South Indian dish made with thin rice noodles (sevai) and paneer (Indian cottage cheese) in a spicy sauce with spices.

info.name: Podi Sevai
info.description: A South Indian dish made with thin rice noodles (sevai) and a spicy powder called podi mixed with spices.

info.name: Pepper Sevai
info.description: A South Indian dish made with rice noodles mixed with black pepper for a spicy kick.

info.name: Veg Biryani
info.description: A vegetarian version of biryani made with fragrant rice cooked with a variety of vegetables, spices, and herbs.

info.name: Curd Rice
info.description: It is a popular South Indian dish made with cooked rice mixed with yogurt, seasoned with mustard seeds, curry leaves, and other spices. It is usually served as a side dish with other main courses.

info.name: Rasam Rice
info.description: It is a South Indian dish consisting of cooked rice mixed with tangy and spicy rasam, which is a thin soup made with tamarind, tomatoes, and other spices.

info.name: Sambar Rice
info.description: It is a South Indian dish consisting of cooked rice mixed with soaked in sambar, a lentil-based vegetable soup.

info.name: Tomato Rice
info.description: A South Indian dish made with rice, vegetables, and a variety of Indian spices, usually served as a lunch box meal.

info.name: Mushroom Biryani
info.description: This is a special version of biryani, a popular Indian rice dish, made with fragrant basmati rice cooked with mushrooms, vegetables, and a variety of spices.

info.name: Gobi Manchurian
info.description: A popular Indo-Chinese dish made with crispy fried cauliflower florets tossed in a spicy and tangy sauce.

info.name: Gobi Pepper Fry
info.description: A stir-fry dish made with cauliflower (gobi) cooked with peppers and onions in a spicy sauce.

info.name: Chilli Gobi Dry
info.description: A popular Indo-Chinese dish made with cauliflower (gobi) stir-fried with onions, peppers, and a variety of sauces.

info.name: Baby Corn Chilli
info.description: A popular Indo-Chinese dish made with baby corn coated in a spicy batter and deep-fried until crispy, then stir-fried with onions, peppers, and a variety of sauces.

info.name: Baby Corn Manchurian
info.description: Another popular Indo-Chinese dish made with baby corn coated in a spicy batter and deep-fried until crispy, then simmered in a thick, tangy sauce made with soy sauce, vinegar, and other spices.

info.name: Baby Corn Pepper Fry
info.description: A stir-fry dish made with baby corn cooked with peppers and onions in a spicy sauce.

info.name: Gobi Fried Rice
info.description: A flavorful dish made with basmati rice, cauliflower, and Indian spices.

info.name: Veg Fried Rice
info.description: A flavorful dish made with basmati rice, vegetables, and Indian spices.

info.name: Baby Corn Fried Rice
info.description: A flavorful dish made with basmati rice, baby corn, and Indian spices.

info.name: Veg Noodles
info.description: Noodles made with mixed vegetables

info.name: Gobi Noodles
info.description: Noodles made with cauliflower and mixed vegetables

info.name: Paneer Butter Masala
info.description: A North Indian dish made with soft cottage cheese (paneer) cooked in a spicy gravy made with onions, tomatoes, and a variety of spices.

info.name: Gobi Butter Masala
info.description: A North Indian dish made with cauliflower cooked in a spicy gravy made with onions, tomatoes, and a variety of spices.

info.name: Chole Poori [1 piece]
info.description: A North Indian dish made with chickpeas cooked in a spicy tomato-based gravy and served with deep-fried bread (poori).

info.name: Chilli Parotta
info.description: A South Indian flatbread made with maida (all-purpose flour), stuffed with spicy chilli and spices.

info.name: Thoothukudi Parotta (2pc)
info.description: A South Indian flatbread made with maida (all-purpose flour) stuffed, comes with paneer butter masala and curd

info.name: Paneer Kothu Parotta
info.description: A popular street food from South India made with shredded paneer, vegetables, and spices cooked on a griddle.

info.name: Pepper Chilly Parotta
info.description: A South Indian flatbread made with maida (all-purpose flour), stuffed with pepper and spices.

info.name: Kothu Parotta
info.description: A popular street food from South India made with shredded parotta, vegetables, and spices cooked on a griddle and finely chopped with a metal spatula.

info.name: Parotta [1 piece]
info.description: A South Indian layered flatbread made with maida (all-purpose flour) and cooked on a griddle.
